### Commercial Vehicle Goods and Service Stops

```{r Total_Stops_ValueBox}
value <- format(cv_trips[Activity %in% c("Goods", "Service"), .N],
                big.mark = ",", digits = 0, scientific = FALSE, trim = TRUE)
valueBox(value, caption = "Goods and Service Stops", icon = "fa-truck")
```

### Commercial Vehicle Tours

```{r Total_Vehicle_Tours_ValueBox}

value <- format(cv_trips[, uniqueN(TourID)],
                big.mark = ",", digits = 0, scientific = FALSE, trim = TRUE)
valueBox(value, caption = "Commercial Vehicle Tours", icon = "fa-truck")

```
